message.content:
cs.DC, cs.MA, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the challenges of programming and scaling behavioral simulations in parallel environments, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also introduces a high-level language for programming simulations, which relates to the sub-category of Multi-Agent Systems (cs.MA). The use of optimization techniques to achieve scalability and single-node performance is relevant to the sub-categories of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper also discusses the programming aspect of simulations, which falls under the sub-category of Software Engineering (cs.SE).
